name: wp-security-dev
install: set -euo pipefail && command -v composer >/dev/null 2>&1 && composer install --no-interaction --prefer-dist --optimize-autoloader && for f in setup-wordpress.sh setup-environment.sh test-github-actions.sh; do [ -f "$f" ] && chmod +x "$f" || echo "warning: $f not found"; done && mkdir -p uploads/oms-scanner/logs && touch uploads/oms-scanner/logs/.htaccess
